name: Reader of the Codex of Sovereignty

system.description:
You have bent bonded artifact and eldritch endowment to one end: raw magical knowledge and power. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your prestige rating is treated as 2 higher than it is with those of a magical bent such as individual spellcasters, magic schools, and the like.
  • All of your wielder levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of qualifying for the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.wzd6hwpk839nyuug]{Entity of Myth}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.edj9ecfsasssg783]{Overclocked Concentration}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4enpadkozx8d4jyl]{Sixth Arcanum}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2gt0w3lau2wsaz54]{Seventh Arcanum}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.csmgapoevjtlj8b8]{Eighth Arcanum}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.kcn45lkzabmwipp3]{Penultimate Arcanum} invocations.
  • When you cast a spell of 5th level or higher, you gain temporary hit points equal to twice the spell level which last for up to 10 minutes.
  • When you reduce a creature with a CR equal to at least half your character level to 0 hit points, you regain your choice of a warlock spell point or an artifact charge. You cannot exceed your normal warlock spell point or artifact charge maximum with this benefit.
system.prerequisite: Pactbound Custodian feat, Pact of the Tome, Bonded Artifact is a Font of Power
